metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21428 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function LoadRGB in PluginDDS.cpp inFreeImage 3.18.0 allows remote attackers to run arbitrary code and causeother impacts via crafted image file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21428` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreeimage3 - 3.17.0+ds1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freeimage package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.17.0+ds1-2ubuntu0.1+esm1').
